basics.name: Jean-Charles FAUVIN
basics.label: Developer Front End - Scrum Master Certified
basics.summary: Hello, My name is Jean-Charles and I'm a front-end developer creating web and mobile applications based on Angular and Ionic Framework. I also like developing my own projects open-source and contributing to javascripts projects. Currently I think progressive web apps are trending. Certified Scrum Master since March 2017 / Coach Agile

work.summary: Powerspace is a company doing native advertising in email and web. As a Front-end Developer I participate to the development of a new web platform based on angularJS, webpack and ES2015 which allow the user to see reports, dashboards, listing of entities.
highlights: Languages : AngularJS 1.5 (ES6), NPM (as runner), Webpack (as Builder), Karma (as test runner), Mocha/chai œ Protractor/Cucumber for testing (units and E2E), Jenkins for the continious integration, Angular Material.

work.summary: Astek is a software and computing services company and my current employer. I worked for two clients : Thales Avionics and LivingObjects
highlights: Thales Avionics : Creating severals mobiles applications with Cordova and AngularJS
Living Objects : Creating a platform to analyse the network performance with AngularJS.

work.summary: Creating a Network Managment System , create Charts and tools to analyse all the data and make a differenciator.The client side use AngularJS with API Rest
highlights: Languages : AngularJS, Flex, SASS, Material Design, D3.js, Highcharts.js, Gulp, webpack, docker, Jenkins for the continious integration.

work.summary: Using HTML, CSS, JS to generate Mobiles applications for Android , iOS, and Windows 8.1.
highlights: ePOTS : Shutter PITO detection probes. Creation of the interface responsive to process and analyze the status of the probe : Android target. Using angularjs , Grunt , Bower, BootStrap , Cordova .

eLogbook : Booklet of usindigital aircraft flight , HMI responsive to track the route of the aircraft and its crew members . Android and W8 target. Using: angularjs , Grunt , Bower, Bootstrap , Cordova , WS REST
Socrates : WEB Client for editing configuration of an aircraft. Appeal to WS REST . Using: angularjs , Grunt , Bower, Bootstrap , WS Rest

work.summary: Creating & Developping an advertising platform which delivers video then integrate the platform on various online video games.
highlights: languages : PHP, jQuery, MySQL, HTML, CSS, Flash

work.summary: Upgrading & Developping an ERP (Entreprise Resource Planning) for opticians.
highlights: languages : Basic Object language and Access 2010

work.summary: Developing a software and a mobile application that help the user to choose the right medication according to their symptoms for the Microsoft's Competition..

education.institution: Institut de l'électronique et du numérique (Toulon, FRANCE)
